text: @riceface11 @SkyNews @piersmorgan @va_shiva Thanks so much appreciate it, apparently it isnt airborne. Reason I asked was cus my cusin her hubby and their 12 yo jus recovered from it. The ONLY time they went out was in their garden to play basketball 🤔
